stats.content:
I'm on **{servers_count}** servers
There are a total of **{shards_count}** shards running
You're on the shard **{shard}**
I'm playing **{total_players}** times and **{shard_players}** times in your shard
I'm up since <t:{uptime}:R>
My server RAM usage : **{used_ram}/{total_ram}GB**
CPU load : **{cpu_usage}%**
Internal temperature : **{avg_temp}**¬∞C (avg) **{max_temp}**¬∞C (max)
stats.footer_text: Servers can be overloaded sometimes. Check the servers status if you experience lags and feel free to report anormal values with /feedback.

privacy.command_description: All legal actions that you can take on data stored by us.
privacy.embed_footer: For any questions concerning your data, contact our team at contact@theireply.fr

policy.description: Show how to access the Privacy Policy of BaBot.
policy.embed_content:
You can consult the BaBot privacy policy in french [at this link](https://www.theireply.fr/babot/pdc.pdf)
*The english version is not yet available*

An archive containing your data will be sent to you through your DMs immediately
**Are you sure you want to continue ?**

delete.description: Delete all the data we have about you
delete.embed_content:
**‚ö†Ô∏è All your data will be immediately deleted ‚ö†Ô∏è**
This includes :
- Your saved playlists
- Your recent activities on BaBot
- Your XP
- Your advantages if you've made a donation
**This action is irreversible. Are you sure you want to continue ?**
delete.success: All your data have succesfully been deleted !
delete.fail: It seems that an issue ocurred when deleting your data, please report it with `/feedback`

cancel.embed_content: Your request has been canceled. You can now safely close this popup !

help.command_description: Get help about features of BaBot.
help.level_description: Infos about how the level system works
help.donator_description: Why should you give some money for BaBot
help.faq_description: Get the answer to frequently asked questions

field_1.name: Explain me fast
field_1.value:
- **Use </player:1052609017802924062>** to start listening music
- **Use </troll:1054878390278176808>** to send BaBot play a funny song in the voice channel of an user without evidences

field_2.name: I want more details
field_2.value:
You can manage how BaBot should works with :
- **</dashboard:1065334605076508772>** : Consult your statistics and access your personal commands
- **</settings:1065334689021296671>** : Configure how BaBot works with you

field_3.name: I'm a server admin
field_3.value: BaBot have some settings you can tweak grouped in the `/config` hub

field_4.name: I've not understand :grin:
field_4.value:
Get more help in the others section of this help center, especially with `/help faq`
Also feel free to join our [Support Server](https://discord.gg/zssHymr656) if your question have definitely no answers

level.title: BaBot and his level system
level.description:
BaBot have a level system that allows users to do actions depending on his level
Each time you use BaBot, you cumulate XP. This XP is used to establish a leaderboard of the most active BaBot users
To determinate the level of each user, the XP gained in the last 7 days is taken. This value is the number of points
*NB : Upvoting BaBot on certain sites (See `/help contribute`) also gives XP*

field_1.name: <:level1:1065239400549724281> Level 1 : < 500 points
field_1.value:
It's the default level.
All the basic function are available

field_2.name: <:level2:1065239416798453921> Level 2 : > 500 points
field_2.value:
Users that uses BaBot sometimes. They can :
- Use the 1000% and 10000% volume settings
- all previous advantages

field_3.name: <:level3:1065239432321568848> Level 3 : > 2500 points
field_3.value:
Active users of BaBot. They can :
- Advantages coming soon here
- all previous advantages

field_4.name: <:golden:1065239445625917520> Golden : Made a donation
field_4.value: A top level granted to donators. Get all the infos about donators using `/help donator`

donator.title: <:golden:1065239445625917520> Make a tip for BaBot !
donator.description: All the basic features of BaBot are free, so to allow him to survive, a tip is really appreciated !

field_1.name: What can I do if a make a tip ?
field_1.value:
You will gain these advantages :
- Use BaBot in 24/7 without confirming that it should stay in the voice channel
- Customize your player theme
- Add up to 10 custom troll songs per server

field_2.name: Do the advantages varies depending of my tip ?
field_2.value:
Every tip give access to <:golden:1065239445625917520>Golden.
However, depending of your tip, you can obtain the ability to make Golden available to all users of a server :
- **5$** : Allow all users of 1 chosen server to use Golden perks
- **15$** : Allow all users of 5 chosen servers to use Golden perks
NB : When the player is displayed in gold, that means an user has applied Golden on the current server

field_3.name: What happens if I don't make a tip ?
field_3.value:
There's no problem !
You can continue to use BaBot as usual, and all the free functions *should* stay free for a long time (at least I hope)

field_4.name: Where can I make a tip ?
field_4.value:
My patreon page is here for that : [Patreon page](https://patreon.com/user?u=85252153)
Btw thank you ! Thanks to you, BaBot will have a future !

contribute.title: How to help BaBot
contribute.description:
**Here are the different ways to help BaBot :**
- Make a </feedback:1060125997359448064> about BaBot
- Upvote BaBot on any site (top.gg, discordbotlist.com, discords.com or botlist.me)
- [Contribute to the development](https://github.com/Theiremi/babot)
- [Translate BaBot to your language](https://crowdin.com/project/babot)
- [Make a tip](https://patreon.com/user?u=85252153)
contribute.footer: A big thanks to anyone who want to help BaBot, as it allows BaBot to survive and grow

faq.title: BaBot FAQ
faq.description: **You have some questions ? You're in the right place !**

field_1.name: BaBot has crashed
field_1.value: That's happening sometimes, but BaBot *should* automatically restart in a fews minutes. Btw sorry for the inconvenience

field_2.name: Why the BaBot player is gold ?
field_2.value:
A gold player indicates that a Golden user has extended his Golden on the server (see `/help donator`)
 *However, the first 250 servers that have added BaBot also have the Golden enabled for life (btw if you're concerned thank you for having launched BaBot !)*

field_3.name: How can I help BaBot ?
field_3.value: There are several ways to help BaBot indicated in the `/help contribute` help page
